name: client

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd client && npm install --production=false && npm run build && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install --production=false && cd ../server && npm install

description: This template provides a minimal setup to get React working in Vite with HMR and some ESLint rules.
